archimate:TechnologyFunction.name: Rate Limiting
archimate:TechnologyFunction.documentation:
Rate Limiting
• Purpose: Prevent system overload and ensure fair resource utilization • Methods: Request throttling, quota management, priority-based limiting • Features: Per-client limits, burst handling, graceful degradation, spike protection • Configuration: Different limits for different API endpoints and user types • Monitoring: Real-time usage tracking, threshold alerts, capacity planning
